body_html: The only thing I tested when I added NCCL_EXTERNAL was that the vendored nccl was not being built (even if its submodule was checked out); I tested this by adding an #error to one of the headers. I'll test with the other configurations.
body_text: The only thing I tested when I added NCCL_EXTERNAL was that the vendored nccl was not being built (even if its submodule was checked out); I tested this by adding an #error to one of the headers. I'll test with the other configurations.
body: The only thing I tested when I added `NCCL_EXTERNAL` was that the vendored nccl was not being built (even if its submodule was checked out); I tested this by adding an `#error` to one of the headers. I'll test with the other configurations.
